name: The Shifting Exhibit
description:
A puzzle platform about rearranging modern art pieces. You are a Paint Goblin who lives inside modern art and cleans up various paintings, picking up palette knives and wedging off paint blobs that don't belong.

A and D to move
Space to jump
Hold Shift or Right Click to enable painting manipulation
Left Click on the paint to move them around the room
(only Orange and Cyan Colors)

Pick up Palette Knives by running into them
E to interact with paint blobs (only after you've picked up Palette Knives
